Wrong ship

It means tanks or ocean vessels essentially, since planes would pretty much impossible to use outside of KMP, which is unstable.

So, yeah. Tanks!

There's no reason planes can't be used in surface battles as long as you're confident in landing them somewhere nearby after you move them.

Edit: @Spartwo: Nautilus is the one you already disabled. Trident is the one that's still alive.

Ok, i have a request:

To all companies, Zokesia is in need of a 20 ton long range fighter craft. It needs to have at least 9K D/V, and have 6 mounts for .5 meter I-beam missiles. Armor is not necessary, but it would need at least a covering of wing panels to protect internal components.

If anyone is interested, please PM me and I will answer further questions.
I've unlocked the secret to forerunner hardlight constructs. YAY!!!!

@MysticPing, I just realized that I'm going to need a lot of practice driving my tanks, so do you mind just doing a normal space battle?

Also, what ships do you have? If you need any, I have a few that I'm about to phase out, due to my recent experiences.

I did the math on that...and short of using ion engines (which present their own power issues and solar panels aren't exactly known for their strength) its going to be a bundle of fuel tanks, a nuclear engine, and then you have like 4 tons left to build everything else you need. So if you're looking for a fighter powered by Liquid Fuel I don't see it happening with those requirements :/

Ok, that's fine.

I just modded your ship a bit - this is the result. Almost twice the Liquid fuel, more ion fuel, Solar panels are in a better place (before you couldn't fire into or away from the sun), a docking port on top, two more Ions, removed the big upright wings, I added some landing legs for lunar ops, and put two small 24-77s in for short bursts of power on landing/ascent.
